subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous palace is located in Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर में कई पर्लियाँ हैं। कौन सी फ्रेंडों में इस पर्ली का मूल स्रोत क्या है।
C_en: Cenotaph of Maharaja Sawai Man Singh II
explanation_en: Amer Fort is a historical site in Jaipur, Rajasthan. It was built as a palace by Raja Mansingh I in 1592 and serves as a mausoleum for his successors, including Maharaja Sawai Man Singh II. Amer Fort is the birthplace of the Cenotaph of Maharaja Sawai Man Singh II.
explanation_hi: आमर फोट नेशांघाई महाराज शावाई सेंटर के मौसों के साधारण स्थान के लोकस्मान वाले शाउनेशांघाई महाराज शावाई सेंटर के साधारण स्थान
explanation_en: Amer Fort, also known as the Cenotaph of Maharaja Sawai Man Singh II, is a historical site in Jaipur, Rajasthan. It was built as a tribute to the successors of Maharaja Sawai Man Singh II.
explanation_hi: आमेर फोट, महाराज शावाइन मंसिंग इस्लेंटाइम सेंटर
